javadoc: RepositoryItemStatus provides status information for a repository folder item.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: version
params.comment: repository item version or -1 if versioning not supported

methods.javadoc: Returns the folder item path within the repository.
methods.name: getPathName
methods.comment: Returns the folder item path within the repository.

methods.javadoc: Returns path of the parent folder containing this item.
methods.name: getParentPath
methods.comment: Returns path of the parent folder containing this item.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the current version of the item or 
 -1 if versioning not supported.
methods.name: getVersion
methods.comment:
Returns the current version of the item or 
 -1 if versioning not supported.

methods.javadoc: Returns the time (UTC milliseconds) when the current version was created.
methods.name: getVersionTime
methods.comment: Returns the time (UTC milliseconds) when the current version was created.

name: RepositoryItem
comment:
RepositoryItemStatus provides status information for a 
 repository folder item.
